<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40d81c97-2590-42e8-27cc-80875c405b92#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A quattrocento portré</string>
            <string language="en">quatrocento portrait</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">quatrocento Portrait</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">verticale de quatrocento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">retrato do quatrocento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ritratto di quatrocento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πορτρέτο quatrocento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">retrato del quatrocento</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A quattrocento portré. A korareneszánsz portrébüszt műfajának kialakulása (Donatello, Verrocchio)</string>
            <string language="en">quatrocento portrait, development of genre of early renaissance portraitbust</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Firenze,  quattrocento,  büszt,  Donatello,  Verrocchio, Andrea del,  Mino da Fiesole,  </string>
            <string language="en">Florence, quattrocento, bust, Donatello, Verrocchio, Andrea del, Mino da Fiesole,</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">quatrocento Portrait, Entwicklung des Genren des 
frühen Renaissance portraitbust</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">verticale de quatrocento, développement de genre 
de portraitbust tôt de la Renaissance</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">retrato do quatrocento, desenvolvimento do genre 
do portraitbust adiantado do renascimento</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ritratto di quatrocento, sviluppo del 
genere del portraitbust in anticipo di rinascita</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πορτρέτο quatrocento, ανάπτυξη του ύφους της 
πρόωρης αναγέννησης portraitbust</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">retrato del quatrocento, desarrollo del 
género del portraitbust temprano del renacimiento</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Florenz, quattrocento, Büste, Donatello, Verrocchio, 
Andrea del, Mino da Fiesole,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Florence, quattrocento, buste, Donatello, Verrocchio, 
del d'Andrea, da Fiesole de Mino,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Florença, quattrocento, busto, Donatello, Verrocchio, 
del de Andrea, da Fiesole de Mino,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Firenze, quattrocento, busto, Donatello, Verrocchio, 
del di Andrea, da Fiesole di Mino,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φλωρεντία, quattrocento, αποτυχία, Donatello, 
Verrocchio, Andrea del, Mino DA Fiesole,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Florencia, quattrocento, busto, Donatello, Verrocchio, 
del de Andrea, da Fiesole de Mino,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
